DOC.brief_title: Pilot Study Evaluate Ear Acupressure Effects Treating Seasonal Allergic Rhinitis
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study investigate clinical potential ear acupressure treat seasonal allergic rhinitis . We hypothesize ear acupressure effective treat seasonal allergic rhinitis change immune parameter psychological impact factor expectation , stress , depression , anxiety moderate ear acupressure treatment effectiveness allergic rhinitis influence immune parameter .
DOC.criteria: Seasonal allergic rhinitis diagnose history clinical examination presence positive skin prick test All participant need least 2 year seasonal allergic rhinitis symptom positive skin prick test one pollen allergens use systemic corticosteroid within past 3 month period , active asthma , hear aid usage , history adhesive tape allergy , history metal allergy , HIV , hepatitis B C , history hematologic , autoimmune , malignant disease , pregnancy lactation , ear acupressure ( EAP ) acupuncture respiratory disease within last 6 month
